languages.text: The Overseer selects a cell within their line of sight in a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking attacks of opportunity. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this ability is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
If the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}, the Overseer chooses two cells with the maximum distance between them equal to (Pet's MP) cells. The second cell must be unoccupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from the first targeted cell to the second one. It deals a small amount of Rending damage and applies (Pet's PER Bonus / 2) Exploits to all enemies on its path. The Cyber-Eagle then lands in the second cell.
If the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}, the Overseer chooses one cell within the Cyber-Eagle’s maximum ability distance equal to (Pet's MP) cells. It may or may not be occupied. The Cyber-Eagle rushes from its current cell to the targeted one. It deals a small amount of Rending damage and applies (Pet's AGI Bonus / 2) Exploits. The Cyber-Eagle then ascends, leaving the battlefield behind. This action doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. После этого он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Бреющий полет — с высоты{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает клетку в зоне видимости на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя атаки по возможности. После этого он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта способность заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Бреющий полет — с высоты{/g}.

Надзиратель выбирает клетку в зоне видимости на расстоянии до 12 клеток от киберорла и еще одну свободную клетку на расстоянии до {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} от первой. Киберорел перемещается в первую клетку. Затем он мчится по прямой на вторую, нанося урон от оружия каждому врагу на пути и не провоцируя атаки по возможности. После этого он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта способность заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Бреющий полет — с высоты{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein Feld in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} in einem Radius von 12 Feldern um den Cyber-Adler sowie ein freies Feld in einem Radius von {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} Feldern um das erste Feld. Der Cyber-Adler fliegt zum ersten Feld und attackiert das zweite Feld in einer geraden Linie. Dabei fügt er Gegnern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}. Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, wird diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} durch {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardement – Kreisen{/g} ersetzt.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher wählt ein Feld in seiner Sichtlinie in einem Radius von 12 Feldern um den Cyber-Adler sowie ein freies Feld in einem Radius von {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} Feldern um das erste Feld. Der Cyber-Adler fliegt zum ersten Feld und attackiert das zweite Feld in einer geraden Linie. Dabei fügt er Gegnern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}. Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, wird diese Fähigkeit durch {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardement – Kreisen{/g} ersetzt.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne une case dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} et dans un rayon de 12 cases autour du cyber-aigle, ainsi qu'une autre case inoccupée à un maximum de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cases de la première. Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Assaut ailé — Vol{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant sélectionne une case dans sa ligne de mire et dans un rayon de 12 cases autour du cyber-aigle, ainsi qu'une autre case inoccupée à un maximum de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cases de la première. Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette capacité est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Assaut ailé — Vol{/g}.

Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Le surveillant sélectionne une case dans sa ligne de mire et dans un rayon de 12 cases autour du cyber-aigle, ainsi qu'une autre case inoccupée à un maximum de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cases de la première. Le cyber-aigle se place sur la première case, puis fonce sur la deuxième en ligne droite, infligeant les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis sur son passage sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette capacité est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Assaut ailé — Vol{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内一个格子，此格子距离生化猎鹰的距离不能超过12格，之后选择另一个格子。两个格子之间的距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。生化猎鹰会飞往第一个格子，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。 随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}猎鹰冲刺——腾空{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官选择视线范围内一个格子，此格子距离生化猎鹰的距离不能超过12格，之后选择另一个格子。两个格子之间的距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。生化猎鹰会飞往第一个格子，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。 随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此能力变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}猎鹰冲刺——腾空{/g}。

监察官选择视线范围内一个格子，此格子距离生化猎鹰的距离不能超过12格，之后选择另一个格子。两个格子之间的距离不得超过{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}格，且第二个格子不能被单位占据。生化猎鹰会飞往第一个格子，之后沿直线冲向第二个格子，对路径上的所有敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。 随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此能力变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}猎鹰冲刺——腾空{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} en un radio de 12 casillas alrededor de la ciberáguila y otra casilla libre a una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} casillas de la primera. La ciberáguila se mueve a la primera casilla y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda, infligiendo su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardeo: elevado{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor selecciona una casilla en su línea de visión en un radio de 12 casillas alrededor de la ciberáguila y otra casilla libre a una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} casillas de la primera. La ciberáguila se mueve a la primera casilla y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda, infligiendo su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta capacidad se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardeo: elevado{/g}.

El supervisor selecciona una casilla en su línea de visión en un radio de 12 casillas alrededor de la ciberáguila y otra casilla libre a una distancia máxima de {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} casillas de la primera. La ciberáguila se mueve a la primera casilla y se lanza en línea recta a la segunda, infligiendo su daño de arma a todos los enemigos en su recorrido sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta capacidad se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardeo: elevado{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。 その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}ストレイフ―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの視界の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。 その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、このアビリティは{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}ストレイフ―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。

監督官は、サイバーイーグルの半径12セルの視界の中にあるセルを1つ選択し、最初のセルから{uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225}以内の別の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは1つ目のセルに移動し、それから一直線に2つ目のセルに突進し、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく進路上のすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。 その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、このアビリティは{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}ストレイフ―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan ve siber kartalın etrafındaki 12 hücrelik yarıçap içinde duran bir hücreyi ve bu hücreden en fazla {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} hücre uzakta bulunan boş başka bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, ilk hücreye doğru ilerler ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} yerini {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardıman — Yükselme{/g} alır.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects a cell within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 12-cell radius around the cyber-eagle and another unoccupied cell within {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} cells from the first one. The cyber-eagle moves to the first cell and then dashes to the second cell in a straight line, dealing its weapon damage to each enemy in its path without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Strafe — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, görüş hattında bulunan ve siber kartalın etrafındaki 12 hücrelik yarıçap içinde duran bir hücreyi ve bu hücreden en fazla {uip|PetsMP|95c502e72a6743d1ad0cbadf13051225} hücre uzakta bulunan boş başka bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, ilk hücreye doğru ilerler ve ardından ikinci hücreye doğru düz bir çizgide atılarak yoluna çıkan her düşmana kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} bu kabiliyetin yerini {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Bombardıman — Yükselme{/g} alır.
